content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_image src=”https://influencermarketingawards.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2023/07/Photo-Seann-Walsh-1.png” title_text=”Seann Walsh” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”400ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”300ms” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_speed_curve=”ease-out” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” sticky_enabled=”0″]

INTRODUCING YOUR HOST:

SEANN WALSH

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Fresh from the jungle on I’m A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here and described as “the best observational comedian of his generation” (The Guardian), this Edinburgh Award nominee’s last UK tour show ‘After This One, I’m Going Home’ ended with standing ovations around the country.

Seann has starred in Live At The Apollo, Tonight at The London Palladium, Celebrity Juice, The Stand Up Sketch Show, Virtually Famous, 8 Out of 10 Cats, Chatty Man and Stand Up Central. 2022 also saw Seann release his latest stand-up special Kiss free to watch on Youtube.

Seann can also be heard on his regular podcast What’s Upset You Now, alongside co-host Paul McCaffrey, which sees them both moan for exactly 15 minutes about the things that infuriate everyone.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
